document_data.name: Kharissa Anuvien
document_data.mainbody: '''Dame Kharissa Anuvien''' was a woman of many talents who earned her living as an innkeeper while simultaneously serving the people as both a holy [[paladin]] and Speaker of city council of [[Helm's Hold]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=SCAG-p85-86">
document_data.Description: She was a charismatic woman who quickly became quite popular among her constituents.<ref name=SCAG-p85-86" />
document_data.Activities: Kharissa served as a paladin of the goddess [[Chauntea]] for some time before settling down in Helm's Hold. She took over ownership of the Old Dirty Dwarf inn and gave it a more welcoming name, [[Venturer's Rest]], which soon became a favored stop by [[adventurer]]s passing through town.<ref name=SCAG-p85-86" />
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Kharissa Anuvien claimed to be the descendent of [[Tolgar Anuvien]], the renowned member of the 14{{th}} century adventuring band known as the [[Company of Crazed Venturers]] who went on to found the [[church of Chauntea|Chauntean]] abbey of [[Goldenfields]].<ref name=SCAG-p85-86" />
